ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necromancers in Neriak?
ygData.msgSnippet: if the guards let you in you should be alright for the most part.  what you MAY have a problem with is the ghouls guarding our guild, the lodge of the dead.
ygData.messageBody:
if the guards let you in you should be alright for the most part. what you
MAY have a problem with is the ghouls guarding our guild, the lodge of the
dead. also, ive heard a rumor that outsiders may be kos in third gate in
general. i would con the ghouls, or walk thru the shadows past them.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro



>From: sidney_earley@...
>
>Does anyone out there have any experience with Gnome necromancers traveling
>into Neriak? I have killed some Crushbone orcs in Lesser Faydark, but not
>alot. Is there a relative safe barometer within Neriak I could con that
>would give me an indication of my faction before I wander around in there
>too much?
>
